product_overview: VAYRA is a premium debt planning SaaS platform that integrates AI-powered financial coaching, behavioral psychology, and clean UI/UX design. It offers users comprehensive tools to manage debt, build savings, and generate income, with robust plan-based access control and multi-language support, wrapped in a Progressive Web App that meets high standards for accessibility, performance, and responsiveness.
core_goals: Deliver a polished, premium feel resembling a $10M SaaS product with emotional intelligence and actionable insights.
Provide secure user authentication and plan-based access control to tailor feature availability.
Enable users to manage debt efficiently using integrated financial tools and AI coaching.
Ensure outstanding accessibility and performance standards including WCAG 2.1 AA compliance and Lighthouse scores ≥90.
Support global user base with multilingual and multi-currency functionality.
Offer a seamless PWA experience with offline capabilities and installability on Android/iOS devices.
Maintain a responsive, visually appealing UI with dark/light mode support, smooth animations, and no layout shifts.
Ensure robust error handling and clean user navigation through protected routes and plan gating.
key_features: Complete Firebase Authentication system supporting email/password and Google sign-in with detailed error messaging and user management.
Landing page with hero section featuring a single branded SVG logo with fade+scale and float animations, responsive and dark mode friendly.
Plan gating and upgrade workflow based on subscription plans (Free, Starter, Pro, Premium) with blurred feature previews for locked features.
Dashboard layout with navigation, header, sidebar components respecting user plan restrictions.
Progressive Web App setup with service worker, manifest with maskable icons, favicon assets, and offline caching.
Reusable UI components including forms, buttons, modals, loading spinners, and language/theme selectors.
Routing implemented with React Router including protected routes and redirect flows when unauthorized or plan-restricted.
Error boundaries and custom error pages to provide graceful degradation.
Internationalization with i18next and UI toggles for seamless language switching.
Dark/light theme support integrated with TailwindCSS and user preferences.
Pricing and plan management pages with clear comparison of feature entitlements and upgrade paths.
user_flow_summary: User lands on the main page and sees a crisp, animated VAYRA logo with clear call-to-action to sign in or sign up.
User navigates to signup or signin pages where forms and Google sign-in buttons are available; user can authenticate via email or Google.
On successful authentication, user is redirected to the dashboard if permitted by plan; otherwise, redirected to upgrade page.
Users on Free plan attempting to access premium dashboard features receive a prompt to upgrade their plan.
Users can switch languages and themes anywhere in the app for personalized experience.
Application ensures no unauthorized access to protected routes, redirecting unauthenticated users to sign-in and free users to upgrade.
PWA install prompts enable users to install on Android/iOS with proper icon display and offline capabilities.
Error pages and console monitoring ensure smooth navigation and quick recovery from unexpected states.
validation_criteria: Landing page contains exactly one hero logo SVG with appropriate sizing and no duplicates.
All branding assets (logo SVG, favicon, icons) load with 200 OK and correct MIME types; no 404s in network requests.
Animations on hero load include fade and scale and float loop but respect prefers-reduced-motion settings.
Header logo always links to home and is visible and accessible with alt text and focus outlines.
Authentication success results in redirect to dashboard; failures show friendly, descriptive error messages.
Plan gating correctly restricts access to premium pages, redirecting free users to upgrade.
No console errors or network failures occur on critical routes (/ , /auth/sign-in, /dashboard, /upgrade).
Accessibility scans (axe-core) return zero critical violations on landing and auth pages.
Responsive layouts at multiple breakpoints with no layout shifts or overlaps, verified on mobile and desktop viewports.
Lighthouse audits on key pages yield ≥90 in Performance, Accessibility, Best Practices, and SEO.
PWA manifest and service worker configurations meet standards for installability and icon usage.
Dark mode toggles maintain logo legibility and UI clarity.
Google Sign-In popup behaves correctly with suitable error messaging for unauthorized domains and creates Firestore user docs on success.
